nodes.description: 2014年起Jammu-Kashmir局势持续紧张，恐怖袭击频率显著上升
nodes.support_text: The situation in Kashmir has been tense since 2014 and there have been several deadly attacks on soldiers.

nodes.description: 2014-2018年间该地区恐怖袭击数量同比激增176%
nodes.support_text: Data released by the Ministry of Home Affairs showed there has been a sharp rise in terror activities including attacks between 2014 and 2018.

nodes.description: 袭击导致40名CRPF士兵死亡，35-40人受伤
nodes.support_text: At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency.

nodes.description: Jaish-e-Mohammed通过视频宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: Pakistan-based terror outfit Jaish-e-Mohammed claimed responsibility for the attack and released a video of Dar, a resident of Kakapora who joined the group a year ago.

nodes.description: 印度政府宣布撤回对巴基斯坦的最惠国待遇
nodes.support_text: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley declared that India is withdrawing 'Most Favoured Nation' status to Pakistan.

nodes.description: 印度外交部召见巴基斯坦高专并向25国代表通报事件
nodes.support_text: India held a briefing for envoys of 25 countries including P5 nations, including US, China, Russia, UK and France. According to reports, India held a briefing for envoys of 25 countries including P5 nations, including US, China, Russia, UK and France.

nodes.description: 45国包括中美俄等国谴责袭击，美国警告巴基斯坦
nodes.support_text: Over 45 countries including the US and China reacted to the dastardly attack. The United States not only condemned the attack but also attacked Pakistan for harbouring terrorists.

nodes.description: 印度安全部队加强戒备并展开抓捕行动
nodes.support_text: Indian administrators and security forces have gone into an overdrive after the devious attack on the CRPF convoy in Pulwama. The security forces in the Valley are on high alert and subsequent operations have been launched to detain more suspects in connection with the attack.

nodes.description: 所有政党因严重事件团结起来

edges.support_text: The situation in Kashmir has been tense since 2014 and there have been several deadly attacks on soldiers. Data released by the Ministry of Home Affairs showed there has been a sharp rise in terror activities including attacks between 2014 and 2018.

Data released by the Ministry of Home Affairs showed there has been a sharp rise in terror activities including attacks between 2014 and 2018. The Pulwama attack occurred on February 14, 2019 when a 78-vehicle convoy was escorting over 2,500 CRPF jawans from Jammu to Srinagar.

At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency. Pakistan-based terror outfit Jaish-e-Mohammed claimed responsibility for the attack and released a video of Dar.

At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency. Finance Minister Arun Jaitley declared that India is withdrawing 'Most Favoured Nation' status to Pakistan.

At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency. India held a briefing for envoys of 25 countries including P5 nations, including US, China, Russia, UK and France.

At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency. Over 45 countries including the US and China reacted to the dastardly attack. The United States not only condemned the attack but also attacked Pakistan for harbouring terrorists.

At least 40 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) paramilitary troopers were killed in the deadliest terror attack witnessed in three decades of Kashmir's insurgency. Indian administrators and security forces have gone into an overdrive after the devious attack on the CRPF convoy in Pulwama.
